Title: Kodocha
Actors: Shizue Oda, Tomoko Hikita, Tatsuya Nakazaki
Plot: The story of super hyper child star Sana Kurata. Her mother is an award winning writer who has strange hairstyles and hats in which lives the family pet, Maro-chan the squirrel. Her manager is, as she describes him, Sana's boyfrie...
